comments.body: You can consider changing to `Omit<T, K extends keyof T>`. That way the string "maxAge" is now tied to the property maxAge on Cookies.SetOption (so if they change the name or remove it then this library will break too and you can make the appropriate changes here).

I see. Thank you. Honestly, I hope Typescript team will reconsider https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/12215 since there are about 90 files that use `Omit` type in this repo.
```
$ ag -l Omit | wc -l
      94
```
